Reviews.Title: “Sisters' Weekend in Napa”
Reviews.Author: Wench117
Reviews.Content: selected property price require 2 nite minimum pretty hotel surrounded establishments centrally located youd buy check person freindly curt tried bed reservation called beds blamed bookingcom printed receipt switched immediately spacious clean refrig micro plus flat screen tv dish network table 2 chairs plenty space decorated roman themes ours venice rm mural beds comfortable afforded stay price reasonable

Reviews.Title: “Great value, good location”
Reviews.Author: BatlinFamily
Reviews.Content: staff personable clean motel st helena highway youre traveling wine country budget spot napa beautiful bed shower free wifi definite plus

Reviews.Title: “Dissapointed at best”
Reviews.Author: Erin_Faverman
Reviews.Content: hotel hotel tiny motel clean outside inside dated carpet stained filthy window view weedy yard dilapidated chicken coop wire clothes line stay napa price 15000 night cheap

Reviews.Title: “nice place”
Reviews.Author: sebsahib
Reviews.Content: nice stay clean lots space mediterranean style handpainted owner beds cosy little fridge downtown 15 minutes walk restaurants street front loud parking free tv nice city try vietnamese restaurant city center

Reviews.Title: “It's a motel, I wouldn't come here again”
Reviews.Author: Boginia1
Reviews.Content: booked hotel minute memorial day weekend else town booked costing 250night im glad found hotels availability 150night saved trip stay avoid definitely motel type accomodations look otherwise luxury vacation motel decent accomodations mattress horrible couldnt fall asleep stay asleep plus check time manager feel unwelcome wasnt rude se approach offputting

Reviews.Title: “Not Worth It”
Reviews.Author: mrclean1
Reviews.Content: hotel looks website totally picture average worth paid townthe women front desk rude help tv frustrated child treated inconvenience recommend
